inn1.comm: pitched up around a length outside off, left alone
a bit closer to off stump this time, on a length again, just straightening a bit, defended on the leg side
runs in nicely and bowls a touch fuller around off, holding its line again, he gets forward and blocks
just short of a good length now, bit if width outside off, he tries to force off the back foot, straight to covers
first run of the match as he shuffles across, and works a back of a length ball wide of mid on
there comes the short ball from Mpofu, at lively pace too, he used it well in the Test, Kayes weaves out of the line
starts back of a length and in to Tamim with the angle, he goes on his toes to keep it down in front of square for a single
hit on the body as he shuffles to try and work him on the leg side, beaten for pace and bounce, ball rolls away on the off side
short of a length again from Vitori, he brings it down on the leg side, not much movement so far
but he is getting it to bounce alright, Kayes has to hold bat high up close to his face to fend it down on the off side
a touch fuller, good delivery, he gets an inside edge as he is late in pushing forward, they steal a sharp single though
similar delivery to the one that got him in the Test, not moving as much as that one did, he hangs his bat out at it away from the body, beaten
Mpofu targets back of a length, he shuffles to work in front of square leg
sharp delivery bowled fuller close to off stump, good leave from the batsman as he withdraws bat late
worked in to the leg side in front of square, he wants the single but there is a man there
goes a touch widish outside off with the angle from over the wicket, left alone
pushed away on the off side off the back foot
almost did him with the slow bouncer, he swivelled early to play the pull and almost hit it straight to square leg, goes on the bounce to that man
played out towards point
lovely delivery, Vitori has got the shape going away from the left-hander, this one holds its line on off stump, and zips past the outside edge as he pushes forward
just a touch shorter, again holding its line, he shuffles across and carefully defends off the back foot
goes full on the pads, and he flicks it quickly to Ervine's right at short fine leg, he does well to get down and stop the ball
goes straight in to Tamim with the angle from back of a length, he works it away to deep midwicket
now this one tails away from just short of a length outside off, left alone this time
on the pads and easily worked away to deep square leg
holds its line from short of a length around middle and leg, he tries to nudge it wide of square leg but it goes straight to that man
now this one moves away with the angle, Mpofu banging it in back of a length, he adjusts to run it wide of point
fuller and he gets the opportunity to push forward, wide of mid off, and they take on the throw, direct hit could have had Kayes in trouble
bowls it fuller again, going away with the angle outside off, left alone
played out in front of square on the leg side
outside edge as he presses forward, but a mighty thick one and it flies down to third man
now he gets it go straight in with the angle, all along from a length, Tamim is uncertain about the away going one and takes it on the body as bat comes at an angle outside the line
holds its line on middle stump, this is good stuff from Vitori, he hastily stabs it away on the off side

the bait from Vitori and the standard response from Tamim, he throws his bat at a short ball that climbs quickly on him, and mistimes the pull in the air for Elton to take a tumbling catch at wide mid on
shot, gets forward to the pitch of a full delivery outside off and crashes it wide of extra cover

almost another one, don't get the hurry that Bangladesh are in, that's the way they went in the Test as well, Nafees throws his bat as he sees a hint of width outside off, and the ball goes on the bounce to squarish third man
Mpofu gets it to bounce from a length, outside off, good angle that, leaving the batsman, who shoulders arms for once
a touch wider outside off now from a length, good carry again, another leave
stays in the crease and guides a length ball leaving him to point
slower one from Mpofu, pitched up all the same, he is already well forward and adjusts to push with an open face towards point
good areas from Mpofu, on a length and zipping away across the left hander, left alone
slower one again, he carefully gets forward, this one bounces a bit, and he defends off the high part of the blade
Vitori keeping it tight just back of a length around middle and off, defended down the track
good line, around off and just about holding its line a tad, he shuffles across and defends
uff, how has that missed off stump, he came forward to a length ball and shouldered arms, it carried on coming in with the angle, and whizzed past the stumps
now the full delivery on the pads, but he cannot put it away, clips straight to square leg
fuller and nipping in, he is not coming forward, caught in the crease and scrambles to keep it out down the track
sends it wide down leg this time with the angle
goes for the release shot, and gets it over and wide of mid on, Vitori goes much fuller and he goes hard at it with a huge swing and gets the first boundary of the innings
plonks front foot out and gets bat in front to defend a pacy length ball
ripper, that has just zoomed away after pitching with the angle around middle, he goes forward and across to push at it, but the sharp away movement beat him
goes hard at a pitched up ball, but mistimes the shot to point
another batsman is hurried in to the pull, Mpofu using the short ball very well, gets big on Nafees but the ball falls safely in front of long leg
and he bowls a slowish length ball leaving the batsman, he hangs his bat out and gets it away towards third man
well bowled, Mpofu has given nothing away, just back of a length and bouncing right on middle, he opens the face to guide it to third man
very full outside off, going straight on, he tries to hammer it through cover, but goes at it with an angled bat, and mistimes the shot back to the bowler
gets well forward this time, Vitori gets it to hold the line and kick from a length outside off, pushed towards point
very useful delivery from Vitori, running in busily and sending down a pacy length ball that carries on coming in with the angle, not far from off stump as he lets it go
this is superb stuff, forced to play at one holding its line very close to off stump, fortunate that he did not edge it
brings the bat down with an open face to push a length ball straightening quickly outside off to point
just a bit of width, he gets the single by guiding it to squarish third man
good start by Bangladesh to the bowling Powerplay, width from the bowler and he crashes it through covers from the crease
gets forward to one coming in with the angle from a length and defends
pitched up close to off, well forward and pushing it towards point
still fuller, he gets front foot and tries to open the face but gets it straight towards point
was that the slower one, seemed to stop on him from a full length as he came forward for the drive, ball goes to extra cover
opens the face late to guide this full delivery to third man
shortish delivery coming in, swung hard with the angle down to long leg
again on the pads, from back of a length, and he shuffles to nudge it to long leg
gets forward to a length ball and opens the face to push towards point
that is a fine shot, this one tails full in to the batsman, who just thwacks it wide of mid on with the angle, pulled back inside the rope

he has gone through him, Vitori gets better and better, he had been working on the angle in to the left-hander, keeping it full mostly, this one came in a bit from around middle, and sneaked in between bat and pad to uproot leg stump as he went for the drive down the ground
Ashraful goes for a tight single first ball, pushes off the front foot in front of mid off, and takes off right away, mid off cannot pick up the ball cleanly as he runs in, that could have been tight
hurls it in on a length, he gets forward to block
fuller now, on off, he pushes softly towards mid on
gets if fine of the pads as he shuffles to flick a fullish one
neatly done, softly works one with the angle in front of square leg and off they go
phew, this one has taken off from back of a length, Ashraful has done well to avoid it, arches back and gets head out of the way, also remembers to drop the wrists
well bowled, lively stuff from Mpofu, kicks from a length and he is hit high on the pad as he comes forward
shuffles and works a shortish one off the pads through square leg

that is the end of Ashraful, he has thrown it away, Vitori all over Bangladesh, it was the short ball, very well directed in to Ashraful, he shuffled across and went for the big pull, and the ball swirled straight in to the hands of long leg
goes full but down leg with the angle

Vitori, Vitori, Bangladesh cannot get away from him, yet another one, well bowled, full delivery on the stumps, coming in with the angle, the front foot was planted across, the bat was late in coming down, the ball crashed in to pad, umpire Dharmasena pondered about it for some time before sending him back
shuffles across to work one off the pads towards square leg
back of a length, he goes deep in the crease and plays it out on the leg side
now he slants it across the right hander, who pushes away from the body, he wants the single, but extra cover dives to cut it off
goes some way down the leg side as he bowls a straight delivery from over the wicket
fires it in very full, but on the pads, and he shuffles to tickle it past the keeper
another full delivery, angled in around off and middle, worked towards mid on
drives a full delivery straight to extra cover
gets this widish one past point, reaches out and opens the face to time the shot past that man
there is a lot of protection in that area, and he cannot get the push past the point region this time
still wider, and he stretches out to have a go at it, straight to shortish cover
bowls a fullish one around off and he gets to the pitch to push toward covers
shuffles and works a back of a length ball in front of square leg
angled across and ending around middle and off, good control from Vitori, he smothers it in forward defence
gets some width off a full one and crashes it off the front foot, good sliding stop at extra cover on the edge of the circle
bangs in the short ball, but some way outside off and it is left alone
drops a length ball in front of cover and trots down the track, sees the fielder advancing towards the ball and changes direction to trot back
stands tall and eases a full delivery with a nice followthrough down the ground, but mid off gets quickly to his left to field
gets around one on the pads and works it down to long leg
plays out a fullish and wide one from the crease to point
squeezes a very full ball past a diving point, third man gets to it, Elton giving too much width at the moment
stands in the crease and punches a length ball to sweeper cover

well what do I know, the wide and full length has worked for Elton, Mahmudullah slams it hard but did not keep it down and it flew straight to Masakadza at backward point, who seemed surprised for a moment as the ball lodged in his hands before celebrating
short and wide outside off, but he cannot get the cut past point
punched off the back foot towards long off
pushed away on the off side, Taibu gets around to it
played out off the front foot on the leg side in front of square
comes down the track, gets too close to the pitch of the ball and pushes it to the bowler
on the back foot and brings the bat down from a big backlift to play it towards midwicket
angles it in full around middle and off, he is a touch late on it and works it in front of square leg, elton has hands on his head
goes for the yorker, gets it very full, and he squeezes it out towards extra cover
sends it down the leg side with the angle
nudged off the pads down to long leg, length ball coming in with the angle, and he gets bat down in time
the off side cordon is packed with numerous men, he comes forward and pushes a fuller one to extra cover
good drive, but getting it past those men will be some ask, cover dives and takes a lot of pace off the shot
Shakib tries to find some runs, whips this full delivery off one leg but there is long on in place
turn from off stump, but slow turn, punched off the back foot to extra cover

more turn, this time from leg stump, he pushes it and gets it past a running 
Utseya down to long off
comes down the track as Utseya flights it well outside off, but it dips around a length and he defends
drives a fuller one with the angle to long on
tossed up just outside leg, he makes some room to drive with the turn but straight to the bowler
played out towards square leg, steady over from Utseya
shortish one getting big on him, he goes on his toes and guides with an open face to backward point
another one gets big on him outside off stump as Elton bangs it in with the angle, he is surprised but opens the face to run it to third man
tries to punch a fullish one with the angle but hits it straight to midwicket
here comes Shakib down the track, Elton sprays it wide outside off, Shakib reaches out and crunches it but another excellent stop at extra cover saves runs
hit in to the off side past point for a single
Zimbabwe fielding has been really good, one more diving stop, at cover as Mushfiqur times a length ball
leaves the crease and drives a flighted ball with the turn past extra cover
slams the attempted pull in to the ground as he gets lots of turn from a shortish length outside off
worked with the turn to long on
slams a full delivery off the front foot, and gets it past Utseya down the ground
worked just past midwicket off the front foot
Bangladesh find the boundary, it is Shakib, gets down on the knee for the full-blooded sweep and gets it in front of square leg as Utseya goes on the leg stump
another one finds the gap, Elton persisting with the wide line and he cracks the cut between two men around point
opens the face to run a bouncing one to third man, again some width outside off
tries to force a pitched up ball past the bowler who gets a hand to it and takes pace off it, Shakib wants the single and comes charging down, but Mushfiqur sends him rightly back
the single is on this time with a work to long on past the non-striker
much better against the right hander, bowled from wide of the crease and he has to defend as it comes in on middle
holding its line a shade from back of a length, but he gets it wide enough of backward point for a tight single as the man cannot stop the ball cleanly to his left
shortish and turning in, makes room to cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
he is getting some turn, but it is slow and does not bother shakib who pushes it down to long on
cannot work it past midwicket as he comes down the track
tries the paddle-scoop off a full delivery, manages a single fine on the leg side
goes back to a length ball that hurries on, but gets the punch past extra cover
down the track and gets the tossed up delivery down to long off
fires it in full around off, he takes a step out and smothers it
shortish and a bit of width, he gets back quickly and cracks the cut in front of point
tosses it up on a length, he gets outside the crease and pushes towards cover
full in to the pads, worked out to midwicket
tight line, goes back but has to push in to the leg side
driven down to long off for a single

has Taibu messed up the stumping, he could not collect cleanly as Shakib danced down the track and had a big heave, was beaten by the flight and it turned past him, Taibu had a simple stumping but took a long time in whipping the bails off, and allowed Shakib to get back
and he gets the boundary now, how much will this cost Zimbabwe, Shakib gets down on the knee and slog sweeps through midwicket, splits the gap in the deep
pulled down the ground to long on for a single
played out in the leg side in front of square leg
good batting this, they are taking the spinners on, lunges forward and gets the slog sweep over midwicket
works a flat and full ball to midwicket
slants it across flat with the angle, he goes for a slash, gets it in the air towards short third man
punched down the ground to long off
fired in full on leg stump, he pushes it in front of midwicket
down the leg side with the angle as he pushes it through
uses the angle on a flat one on the pads to whip it through square leg
good flight from Utseya, he works it off the front foot to midwicket
goes hard at a tossed up ball as he leaves the crease, gets it to long off
tosses it up slowly through the air, Shakib does not charges this time, just skips out and eases it to long off
tries the scoop again, but gets it a touch high on the bat, the man from square leg came running to his right but it fell short of him
played down the ground for a couple
brings up the 50 of the stand with a cut off the back foot as he bowls this one flat outside off, Zimbabwe appear to have gone flat in recent overs as well
width outside off as it goes on with the angle, and he gets the cut wide of sweeper cover
straightening on middle from a length, he goes back to block it without fuss
flicked in front of midwicket for a tight single
backs away and punches it off middle stump to long off
straightish one hurrying on from a fuller length, he defends down the track
pushes firmly off the front foot down to long off, these two are just milking the spinners
flighted full around off, carefully worked with the turn to midwicket
pushed off the front foot to extra cover
forces a full one with the turn through midwicket
shuffles across and outside the line to tickle it with the angle to square leg
tossed up, but he waits on it to turn, and cuts it hard wide of Price in the deep to come back easily for the second
not much happening for the spinners, slow turn from middle and he punches it off the back foot to long off
pushes off the back foot to long off
defends a flighted one off the front foot
fired in on a length but it gets up slowly, he pushes it down the track
comes down the track, but Price shortens the length and he has to defend
tight single, worked towards square leg and they rush across, direct hit was needed though, by the time Taibu collected and whipped off the bails, batsman was home
hit away wide of sweeper cover for a comfortable couple
and starts off wide outside off again, slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
much tighter against the left hander from round the stumps, pushed down the ground
coming in with the angle from wide of the crease, he cannot guide it wide of point
lots of width this time, Zimbabwe letting the pressure slip, punched easily to sweeper cover
worked behind square leg off the pads, and gets back for the second, well done
shuffles across and whips a full delivery down to long on
loud appeal from Taibu for lbw, that looked very close, struck in front of middle from a full length as he tried to sweep, late on the shot, not given, that looked like it would have hit leg stump
pushed towards point, Mush wants the single but is sent back, a second later and it could have been tight
pushed down the ground to long off
defended off the back foot as he fires it in
pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
turning away a tad, rare from Price, he makes room to push down to long off
more width from Elton, but there is a short point in place and he cuts straight to him
whoa, Mushfiqur looks to go down the ground, closes the bat face, and the edge flies in the air but falls short of third man
full delivery driven hard wide of long on
tries to reach out to a wide ball and drive through extra cover but hits it back to the bowler on the bounce
now he finds extra cover as he eases forward and pushes a length ball
inside edge goes past the stumps and past Taibu as well, as he looks to belatedly swat an angled delivery that wasn't short enough
on the pads and worked easily wide of square leg
whipped off the back foot straight to midwicket
too short and down leg with the angle, he bends the knee and swings it hard past short fine leg, poor delivery
again on leg stump, he shuffles to work behind square leg
stays in the crease and squeezes a fuller one towards extra cover
good run and diving stop at short third man, Shakib had cut the flat delivery hard and it was travelling
and goes past the outside edge as he gets some lift and away movement off a length
stays beside the line and pushes past point to the man in the deep
fullish one right on middle, he pushes with a big straight followthrough to long on
very full delivery now, he squeezes it past the man at extra cover
short, wide, bouncing delivery, he gets an edge as he goes for the cut, and it trickles past the keeper on the off side
pushed away towards extra cover, a steady over, but Zimbabwe need much more
gets forward to push an angled full delivery down to long off
gets around another full ball to drive along the ground to long off
Bangladesh are not being troubled at all, another pushed single to long off, easy as they come
now sweeps from outside leg stump and gets it behind square leg
tries to steer with the angle past short third man, gets it straight to that man, but the single is on
blocks a fullish ball off the front foot
half century for the Bangladesh captain, eases a full delivery straight down the ground, yet again he is there to guide Bangladesh to a fighting total
pushed away towards extra cover
bit of inward movement after pitching on a length outside off, guided to backward point
forced off the back foot to mid off
tries to squeeze a very full delivery but Masakadza gets to his left to field
pushes a length ball off the front foot to long off for another single
takes it from around off as he backs away and guides it towards sweeper cover
stays in the crease to a tossed up ball, he has been doing this often, and pushes wide of extra cover
good shot, comes down the track and works with the turn wide of long on, who runs in hard but fumbles to allow the second, bringing up 50 for Rahim as well, well played, could bat higher up the order
now the 100 stand comes up with a push to long off
Shakib continues to pick up the singles comfortably
another pushed single on the off side, how well have these two soaked up the pressure
pushed hard down the track to the bowler
drives a full delivery from middle along the ground to long on
makes room and forces the cut past point
pushes a length ball to midwicket
shuffles across to work one off the pads, it beats Taibu as it trickles off the pad

that is a superb catch, Shakib has to walk back, he has batted so well, tried to force a length ball leaving him from the crease, did not have much room to work with, and pushed in the air towards shortish extra cover, who went down on his left to take a very sharp chance, it was flying past him
hits the high part of the bat from back of a length right away
width outside off, but he carefully guides it to backward point, he will have to do most of the scoring now
that is well played, he came forward and opened the face to send the length ball racing fine wide of third man
cut away to point off the back foot
more width but he does not go hard at it, keeps the cut down towards point
slower and fuller, he pushes forward towards extra cover
tosses it up and he pushes it straight back at him, but it goes right through Utseya who was a bit late in getting down
pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
gets out of the crease with the turn to long on
turning slowly from around leg stump, he pushes half forward and gets it towards square leg
shortish and turning away outside off, cannot get it past covers
worked in to the leg side for a single
goes down on the knee and crunches the slog sweep wide of the man at deep midwicket who runs hard to his right and puts in the slide to save the boundary
worked with the turn to short fine leg
cannot get it past short fine leg again
bounces a but from a length and he pushes it down to long on
uses the angle to nudge for a single to square leg off the pads
lunges forward and pushes a length ball to long on for a single
reaches out to push a flighted one back to the bowler
confusion, pushed in to the off side, Rahim was half way up the track for the single, slipped as Utseya missed the pick up, and was back by the time extra cover got to the ball
pushed down to long on
Rahim down the track and picks out long on, fired in full, he got close to the pitch of the delivery and lofted it straight to that man, 100th ODI wicket for Utseya
takes it on the pads as he misses the work off one turning away from the pads
pushed down the track off the front foot
pulls a shortish one hard but to the man at deep midwicket
and another one goes, Razzak can't do anything this time, went back to force one going across through the leg side, it rushed on to him, and he got a top edge that popped straight to extra cover
tossed up full, and he goes past the outside edge as batsman presses forward
worked on the leg side for a single
goes back and pushes in front of point
inside edge on the leg side as he pushes forward to a flighted ball
poor delivery to start with, full toss on the pads and he puts it away past short fine leg with a neat twirl of the wrists
again fullish on the pads, but he cannot connect this time and it pops up on the leg side
much better, finds the line this time, full and heading for middle and leg, he manages to jab it away
almost got through, goes for the yorker, gets it right around middle too, but Shuvo manages to dig it out
inside edge as he bangs in a short of a length ball that climbs in to Shuvo, who edges it off the pad towards Taibu on the off side

two appeals, both turned down, worked off the pads in front of square leg, Vitori appeals for leg before but it pitched outside leg and then Taibu appeals for run out as Shafiul gets back in to the crease
worked in front of square leg and now they get the single
plays it out towards midwicket off the back foot, Price fields
cannot get it past square leg
swings hard and gets it wide of the man at deep square leg
short, and he goes back to swing at it, just over the man at mid on and it will run in to the boundary
goes for another heave-ho off a flighted full delivery on leg stump, inside edge on to pad but they will get the single
darts it in to the pads on a length, trickles in to the off side and they take the run
now in to the left hander's pads from a fuller length, he nudges it in front of square leg
makes room and pushes at a widish one to send it to third man
length ball hit hard but down to long on, only a single

there is the five-for on debut for Vitori, first Zimbabwean to do so, Zimbabwe get together in a huddle, Shafiul went for the big lofted shot off a full delivery over mid off but could not clear the man who went to his left to take the simple catch

and almost a sixth wicket on debut, now Shuvo tried to shovel a full delivery straight down the ground, mid off went flying to his left, got both hands to the ball, but it was always going to be a tough chance and the ball popped out
smacks a full one with the angle down to long on
beaten outside off as he has a waft at a length ball
low full toss hit in front of midwicket, who got around to the ball but the single had been taken by then

that is the end of the innings, there was never going to be a second run, it was worked in front of square leg, they were looking to get Shuvo back on strike, but the man from square leg  got quickly to the ball, put in the slide and fired in the throw to Taibu, who did the rest, Rubel tried to get back but he was already half way down the track for the second and was never going to make it back

inn2.comm: gets it to move away from the right hander first up, but from outside off, and he lets it go
first runs for Zimbabwe, shuffles across to work a length ball through square leg, and comes back for the second
widish delivery outside off stump, left alone, good carry for Shafiul
this is good shape away from Taylor, nippy pace too, he leaves it alone as it is a long way outside off
bowls back of a length and in to Taylor with the angle, and he shuffles across to drop it in front of midwicket for a quick run
well bowled, straightening after coming in with the angle outside off, he pushes at it, but the edge drops short and goes past slip
coming in a tad off a length, not getting up much, he goes on the back foot to push towards mid on
that is a fine take from Rahim, Rubel just lost the line as he slung it way down the leg side, Rahim had to put in a big dive to save four byes
good line this time, outside off stump on a length, left alone
there goes Taylor with the cut, in front of point as usual, and in to the gap, short and wide and he pounced on it
fine shot, shuffling across and whipping a short of a length ball from around middle past the man at mid on
punches solidly off the back foot but straight to mid off, Rubel could do with a fuller length
cracks the cut again, but this time he will find backward point, Rubel going shortish and giving width outside off again
leaves alone one outside the off stump
another leave outside off
neat drive, getting to the pitch of a full delivery but finding shortish extra cover
full in to the pads, and he uses the angle to whip wristily over square leg
they are going hard at the top, full and wide outside off this time, he gets forward on a knee and goes for it, getting it over backward point
better from shafiul, getting it to come in with the angle off a length, he gets forward to block
pushes away from the body back to the bowler
tossed up full outside off, left alone
goes back to a length ball and punches to covers
short and wide, turning away, cut right to cover, should have been put away
gets the punch down to long off this time
goes for the sweep as he fires it in full, gets it off the pads wide of short fine leg
gets forward and smothers one tossed up from wide of the crease
fired down the leg side, he tried to work it away but it goes past the bat and the keeper fine down leg

bowled 'em, Shakib does it for Bangladesh, it went straight on, tossed up on a length, from wide of the crease, he pushed forward for the turn, there was none, and the ball clattered in to the stumps, sneaking in to the substantial gap between bat and pad
that was close, he pushed forward in defence, but it threatened to trickle back towards the stumps
tries to take him on, comes down the track, and lofts, gets it just wide of mid on
they go up for the lbw, but there was bat on that as he pushed forward
off the inside edge on to pad as he leaves the crease again but is beaten in flight
going straight on full outside off, left alone, Rahim chirping as usual from behind the stumps
that will help zimbabwe, he was in control of the shot as he came down the track, got to the pitch and drove straight past the non-striker
worked off the pads straight to short fine leg
this is not an easy shot, but he has done it twice, down the track, to the pitch and lovely followthrough as he gets the drive straight down the ground
pushed off the front foot on the off side
goes shortish now, he goes on the back foot to push to mid on
has him driving away from the body with flight outside off, mistimes it to extra cover as it dips on him
pushed back down the track off a fuller length
gets down the track and eases a full delivery to deepish mid on
just a touch short and he whips it off the back foot in front of square leg, the man in the deep is a touch slow in getting around and they take three
looking to attack all the time, drives hard in to the ground and bowler fields
pushed down the track off the back foot
shortish and hurrying on for the middle stump, he goes back and jabs it back to the bowler
another fine shot, flighted delivery around leg, he gets to the pitch, they have used the feet well, and times it past mid on
now the sweep, another boundary, fires it in on the pads, and he gets down to hit it wide of short fine leg
appeal for leg before, but that pitched outside leg, and was headed down the leg side as well, he was struck on the pad as he missed the sweep
pushed off the front foot on the off side
quicker one, he gets bat and pad together to defend
not to the pitch as he comes down the track again, but bat and pad were close together and he managed to push to long off
they are doing it almost off every delivery, leaves the crease again, he shortens the length and a defensive block is all he can get away with
whipped off the back foot through square leg
overthrow now, again using the feet to push a length ball on the off side, the throw was well away from Rahim
defended off the front foot
neatly done, slightly short, going straight on the pads and worked away through square leg
length ball punched off the back foot to the bowler from around off stump
going on the pads and easily worked square off the back foot
straightening around off, he goes back to punch down the pitch
short delivery, half-tracker, he is not quite on top of the pull as he rocks back but gets it over midwicket
tossed up a tad around off, defended off the front foot
hurrying on from a length, he goes back to keep it out
short and flat outside off, hit straight to short extra cover
direct hit at the non-striker's but the driven single to mid on was well-judged
solid punch off the back foot, easy single to long off
flighted full on the pads, he gets forward and nudges to short fine leg
they have used the feet really well, Shakib fired the ball wide down leg as he saw him coming, he made some room and whipped it through midwicket

drops it short, and the strategy has been clear, use the feet to anything that is not short, and if it is short, just rock back and have a go, as Masakadza does this time and whacks it over deep midwicket
punched off the back foot to long off
cracked off the back foot straight to extra cover, some turn for the bowler
pushes forward and drives solidly with the angle to long on
opens the face to guide a tossed up ball to short third man
whipped off the pads, just a touch short and a couple is taken through square leg
shortish again, and easily worked off the pads through square leg, just pushed through the air, no turn, no nothing, just the angle, which is used neatly by the batsman
flighted slowly through the air, bit of turn as he gets forward to defend
more flight, from wide of the crease, he goes forward to smother it
top edge, but he survives, went down to sweep a fullish one, short fine leg was around but he didn't seem to pick it, it wasn't that far from him, he did not run forward but a touch sideways
played out towards midwicket
pushed back down the track
solid drive off the front foot to long off
crack! short, wide, flat, sitting up, bashed off the back foot through cover
more of the short and wide and flat stuff but he has sweeper cover in place now to restrict the cut to a single
better from Shuvo, fuller and slower outside off, pushed away off the front foot
flat again, short of a length, punched off the back foot to long on
huge appeal for leg before, the rewards of tossing it up full, he went for the big sweep, missed and was struck on the pad that looked like it would have missed off
pushed full but down the leg side, and he gets the sweep away this time backward of square leg

smashing shot, shot of the innings, down the track as he sees a bit of flight, and drives with the turn, big flourish as the ball disappears to the extra cover boundary, in the air for a while but safe all the time
worked off the pads in front of square leg
pushed off the front foot
down the track, how many times have they done that, gets to the pitch and drives to long on
another fine drive off the front foot, wide of long off this time
he will remain on 49 though as he works one off the pads straight to a very fine short fine leg
flat delivery, pushed off the back foot to long on
fired in full on the stumps, blocked off the front foot
stays back to a tossed up length ball and cannot time the push past the bowler
that will be 50 for Sibanda, goes on the back foot to whip backward of square leg, lots of cheering from the crowd, as fluent an innings as you'll see
pushed down the track off the back foot
single to long on as he goes back to a length ball, not much for the spinners in this track, sitting up from a length
takes on the flighted ball, but drives it straight to the bowler
tight single as he works in front of midwicket
well bowled, tossed it up quicker and wider as he saw him advancing, he had to defend it in the end
worked away towards square leg for another single
another single to square leg, the region is vacant
flattish one pushed back to the bowler
gets down on a knee and paddle scoops from outside off with the turn, gets it fine past the man in the ring
down the track, but he shortens it and he has to push it back to the bowler
shortish and he looks to swing it through square leg but good diving stop from the man there
some impatience from the batsman as he charges out again, not to the pitch and plays it out on the leg side
cannot get it away, pushed out on the leg side quietly
gets the single finally as he works it past midwicket
pushed down the ground to long on
goes on the back foot and picks up another single to long on
sharp single, the running has been good, fired down leg as he saw him coming down the track, he manages to get some bat on it to get it wide of short fine leg
pushes a fullish one with an open face towards point
stays in the crease and tries to guide it away, straight to covers
shortish and wide, not getting up much, he rocks back and slaps it straight to extra cover
pushes with a straight bat to long on for a single
worked off the back foot in front of square leg
beats him in flight as he goes forward and tries to hit one from outside off, in the air for a while but well short of long off
pushed back down the track
cannot work it away past square leg as it turns in
sweep from outside off now, almost takes out the square leg umpire, and takes three as deep midwicket gets around in the end
punches a shortish one to midwicket
defends a tossed up ball down the track
gets the single now with a solid push to long on off the back foot
gets him to drive off the front foot with flight outside off, straight to extra cover
pushed through quicker and defended off the front foot
length ball outside off stump, he gets forward to smother it
pushed off the back foot but cannot get it past midwicket
worked off the back foot, to midwicket again
now straight to square leg off the pads, non-striker has to get back  quickly
appeal for lbw, goes for the sweep from outside off, struck in front of off, would that have gone down leg with the turn, looked mighty close
pushed away towards midwicket
tight over, off the pads backward of square leg
driven off the front foot to long off
down the track, and working the flat delivery past midwicket
again he gets out of the crease and eases a fullish one to long on
swept from middle stump wide of short fine leg

that is gone, that is completely needless, running headlong in to trouble, worked to midwicket and Sibanda takes off, Masakadza is hesitant and trots outside his crease, now Sibanda stops, and Masakadza feels the need to take the run and rushes down the track, midwicket rips the throw to Rahim who catches Masakadza well short as he tries to come back
pushes a full one around middle and leg down the track
lovely use of the feet, couldn't get better than this, slithers down the track, and lofts with the turn well over long on
played out towards midwicket
down the track again and goes straight over the bowler, long on will get to this one
goes deep in the crease to work in front of square leg
tossed up slowly, and has him watchfully defending on the off side
fullish one whipped off the pads through midwicket
and is driven straight past the non-striker's stumps as he bowls a fuller one coming in with the angle
right through him, Taibu's middle stump is uprooted, Rubel lets it rip from wide of the crease and it comes in off a length, Taibu is very tentative in the crease and cannot get the bat down in time
and another one, Bangladesh sneaking back in, Ervine hangs the bat out limply at one leaving him outside off on a length, and feathers it on its way to the keeper
good delivery, right up there, on off stump, he is tentatively forward but manages to keep it out
poor shot, making a bit of room to try and chop it away, beaten, not much width, not short enough
tries to pull, very weak on the shot and gets it off an edge on to thigh pad
fired in full down leg
pushed towards midwicket off the front foot
pushed through quicker, he jams down the bat on it and gets it towards long on
caught on the back foot, struck on the pads, going down leg though
pushed off the back foot down to long on
full delivery nudged off the pads to short fine leg
tossed up outside off, he drives wide of cover for a single
Rubel has cranked up the pace, gets it to hit the high part of the bat from a length, played out towards point from the crease
targetting the stumps from a fuller length, clipped in the air wide of midwicket
slung in on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket
comes back in a long way from a length outside off, chopped away to wide slip
length ball defended off the front foot outside off
now the short and wide ones are finding the fielders, goes for the cut, not much on the shot, to point on the bounce
pushed through and straightening on off, goes forward to defend
another forward defensive, on the leg side now
gets him to charge down the track, he wanted to go over the bowler, got it off the inner half of the blade to long on
carefully forward to defend a fuller one
nudged off the pads straight to short fine leg
tries to go for the drive but this one is pushed through quicker and flatter, and he mistimes it back to the bowler
homing in on off stump from wide of the crease, blocked firmly off the front foot
brave leave outside off, as he takes a step out to a length ball which comes back in quite some way to go close to off stump
launches in to the pull off a marginally short one and gets it wide of deep midwicket
that will help Zimbabwe, short and wide, Sibanda cracks the cut through point, in between the two men around that region
squeezes a length ball from close to off towards point, some hesitation but they get through for the single in the end, Mutizwa has to hurry
straightest of straight drives off a full delivery clatters in to the non-striker's stumps
nudges a full one off the pads to square leg
another nudge off leg stump, another single through square leg
skips down the track and drives straight to midwicket
could have been close as this one hurried on as he went  on the back foot, but he managed to work it in front of square leg, Shakib tries to stop the ball with his legs but cannot
down the track again, he hasn't abandoned that approach with all those wickets falling, picks up a single to long on
gets an inside edge towards square leg as he presses forward
chops a length delivery wide of point for a tight single
almost chopped on, comes back in from a full length, very close to off, he makes room and tries to get it past point, inside edge almost goes past the stumps to the keeper
worked away through midwicket
gets around a full delivery and works it towards square leg
another one comes in, this time from a length, he stays in the crease and pushes towards extra cover
slung in full on middle and leg, played out in front of square leg
pushed away in the air towards midwicket
goes for the cut off the back foot, and gets it off a thickish edge past backward point
pushed off the back foot past extra cover down to long off
shuffles across but can't get the work past short fine leg
he isn't looking very comfortable, pushes awkwardly to midwicket off the back foot
finally gets the single off the last ball, nudged off the pads wide of short fine leg
Rubel continues to persevere around off stump, fires it in full, he gets forward to defend
caught in the crease, he has got away a few times now, Rubel slings it in off a fuller length, it keeps coming in, and he almost chops it one again
hit on the pads outside leg as he tries to work away a length ball angled in
goes for the pull as he swivels in the crease, gets it off the outer half of the bat to mid on
still shorter, he shapes up for the pull but weaves out in the end as he sees the ball climb too much outside off
carefully opens the face to guide a length ball to point but then falls over as he looks for the single
pops up in the air off the pads towards vacant short leg
fired in to the pads from a length, nudged off the back foot through square leg
high and mighty goes Sibanda, advances down the track, and lofts him way over the straight boundary,
driven down the ground to long off, moves to 90 now
now Mutizwa tries to go down the ground, drags the flat delivery wide of mid on in the end
gets down the track but defends down the track
almost sneaks through, Rubel continues to get it to bend in off a length, and he inside edges it in to pad as he is caught in the crease
trickles off the pads towards square leg as he shuffles but cannot connect to a fullish one
goes for the pull, short ball climbing outside off stump, he fetches it and gets it just over and to the right of mid on, not in control at all
hit on the pads as Rubel bends it in with the angle from a length, outside leg though
pacy full delivery on the pads nudged through square leg in the air
around off this time on a full length, driven solidly off the front foot to mid off
Mutizwa gets one away this time, gets down the track, makes some room and puts him well over mid on
pushes well forward and eases a fullish one past the non-striker, mid on is there but the single is on

Sibanda has his sights on the 100, charges out, he fires it in full down leg, he  gets bat right to the pitch and ;lofts over midwicket, long on goes charging to his right and stops the ball with a dive, but they run four, that is superb running
pushed down the ground for a single
fires it in down the leg side with the angle
pushes a full one fired in on the off side
lunges forward to smother a tossed up ball

Sibanda has thrown away the hundred, he hasn't been in control of the pulls off Rubel, is hurried for pace with another well-directed short one, and hits it straight to square leg as he arches back too much, tame end to a superb knock, he has shown Zimbabwe how to tackle the slow left-armers
shuffles and goes on his toes to keep a shortish one down
late in getting the bat down as another one bends in for the stumps from a length, but jams it away towards midwicket
almost sneaks through, he is hurling them in, targetting the stumps, keeps low and is kept out awkwardly towards mid on
goes for the yorker, gets it on the pads and he gets some bat on it to get it towards square leg
Rubel now lets the shortish one rip, it gets big on Elton who tries to weave out of the way in the end but takes it on the arm as it is too quick to be avoided
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
pushed off the front foot, in the air for a while but falls short of the bowler
pushed straight to midwicket
pushed away off the back foot to extra cover
pushed through quicker and fuller, defended off the front foot
with nine required, he plays out a maiden as another push finds midwicket
nasty short one from Rubel, he has bowled superbly today, gets big on elton who bends the knee and goes down just as this one rears at his throat
another short one, not as big a brute as the earlier one, he gets out of harm's way
knows this is going to be another short ball and eagerly launches in to the pull, but too early in to the shot and takes it close to the helmet
gets off strike, he won't mind that, with a work on the leg side
pushes a fuller one off the front foot and brings elton back on strike with a single to mid on
pushes hastily from the crease, Rubel has his hand on his head, another incoming one that could easily have been chopped on
pushed away towards extra cover but the bowler gets to it
gets forward and defends off the front foot
down the track and eases a fullish one past the non-striker;s stumps
defends a fullish one bat and pad close together

comes down the track and gets it past midwicket with a heave, they thought about the third for a long time, but non-striker had to dive back in the end as the throw came in before the decision was made
another heave, this time in front of square leg
stands in the crease to a fullish one homing in and plays it out down the track, Zimbabwe in no hurry to get home
stays beside the line and guides a length ball towards point
Zimbabwe are taking an age to get home, now Elton goes, Rubel has his fourth, tries to smoke a full delivery over mid on but cannot clear the man
gets front foot across and pushes a length ball on the off side
solidly defended from the crease as he bowls a pacy fuller one around off
bit of an inside edge as he gets forward to keep out another one angled in
comes down the track to try and finish it, he fires it down leg, and he pushes it in the air off the pad
Zimbabwe get it done with finally, to lots of applause, he gets it away to the third man boundary
